券売機: (けんばいき) - ticket machine; ticket-vending machine
券面: (けんめん) - the face of a bond, draft (draught) or certificate

刹那: (setsuna) - moment, instant; kshana, duration of a single mental event (cerca de 1/75 de segundo), shortest possible interval of time
刹那主義: (せつなしゅぎ) - (yoji) principle of living only for the moment
刺々しい: (とげとげしい) - sharp; harsh; stinging; thorny; snappy
刺さる: (ささる) - to stick into (something with a sharp point); to prick; to pierce; to get stuck (in); to lodge (in)
刺し: (さし) - grain thief/sharpened tube for testing rice in bags; sashimi (sliced raw fish); stabbing/piercing/pricking

刺し殺す: (さしころす) - to stab to death

刺し身: (さしみ) - sashimi (raw sliced fish, shellfish or crustaceans)
刺し身のつま: (さしみのつま) - sashimi garnish; something of no significance/something that can easily be done without
刺し身の妻: (さしみのつま) - sashimi garnish; something of no significance/something that can easily be done without

刺し違える: (さしちがえる) - to misplace; to stab at each other
刺す: (さす) - to pierce/to stab/to prick/to stick/to thrust; to sting/to bite; to sew/to stitch/to embroider; to pole (a boat); to catch (with a limed pole); {baseb} to put (a runner) out/to pick off
刺のある言葉: (とげのあることば) - stinging (barbed) words; harsh language
刺の有る言葉: (とげのあることば) - stinging (barbed) words; harsh language
刺を通ずる: (しをつうずる) - (also 刺を通じる) to present one's card

刺椿象: (サシガメ) - assassin bug (any insect of family Reduviidae)
刺殺: (しさつ) - stabbing to death; {baseb} putting out
刺毛: (しもう) - stinging hair (of a nettle, caterpillar, etc.)
刺激: (shigeki) - estímulo, impulso, incentivo, encorajamento, motivação, provocação, empolgação, emoção
刺激の貧困: (しげきのひんこん) - poverty of stimulus

刺股: (さすまた) - two-pronged weapon for catching a criminal; man-catcher war fork
